lead_paragraph: SCOPPETTA--Nicholas. The FDNY Foundation Board of Directors mourns the loss of fellow Board member Commissioner Nicholas Scoppetta. Commissioner Scoppetta was actively involved in the mission of the FDNY Foundation educating residents and visitors in New York City about fire and life safety resulting in the decrease of injury to FDNY members and in fire deaths each year. We were grateful for his leadership and he will be missed. 1/3
